T03D3799:199b-17: de'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi chos thams cad ni btags par yod pa grub ste /
T03D3799:199b-18: rang rig gi sems su snang ba nyid la sgro
T03D3799:199b-19: btags shing tha snyad du bya zhes pa ni dmigs
T03D3799:199b-20: pa'o // de rnams btags par grub pa nyid kyi
T03D3799:199b-21: dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa thams
T03D3799:199b-22: cad ni rang bzhin gyis brjod du med ces pa
T03D3799:199b-23: pa'o // ni rnam pa'o // rnam par mi rtog
T03D3799:199b-24: pa'i ye shes kyi me'i sngon du 'byung bas na
T03D3799:199b-27: rtse mo chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa gsungs pa //
T03D3799:199b-28: gzugs sogs mi gnas de rnams ni //
T03D3799:199b-29: de yi ngo bo rang bzhin med //
T03D3799:199b-30: de dag gcig gi rang bzhin gcig / de mi rtag sogs bar mi gnas //
T03D3799:199b-32: tshigs su bcad pa dang po 'di'i phyed kyis ni dmigs pa bstan to //
T03D3799:199b-33: phyi ma phyed kyis ni de'i rnam pa bstan to //
T03D3799:199b-34: gang gi phyir de rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
T03D3799:199b-35: de'i ngo bor ni gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bor ro //
T03D3799:199b-36: rang bzhin med ni dngos por ma grub pa'o //
T03D3799:199b-37: de'i phyir gzugs sog ni gzugs kyi phung po la sog pa'o //
T03D3799:199b-38: mi gnas ni khams mi len pa ste dmigs pa bstan to //
T03D3799:199b-39: de dag ni gzugs la sogs pa ste /
T03D3799:200a-0: @200a * // de la stong pa nyid du gcig pa ni phan tshun rang bzhin gcig pa nyid kyi so //
T03D3799:200a-1: de bas na gzugs la sogs pa mi rtag pa
T03D3799:200a-2: dag rtag pa la sogs par mi gnas zhes pa
T03D3799:200a-3: ste / khas pa blangs zhes pa ni rnam pa'o //
T03D3799:200a-4: rtse mo 'bring po'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa brjod par bya ste ;
T03D3799:200a-5: de rnams de'i ngo bos stong //
T03D3799:200a-6: de dag gcig gi rang bzhin gcig / ces pa ni dmigs pa'o //
T03D3799:200a-7: chos rnams mi 'dzin gang yin dang //
T03D3799:200a-9: de rnams shes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung por gyur pa rnams te /
T03D3799:200a-13: bdag med pa la sogs pa rnams so sor gzugs stong pa dang /
T03D3799:200a-14: de'i ngo bos stong zhes pa ni mi rtag pa
T03D3799:200a-15: la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de'i ngo bor stong pa
T03D3799:200a-16: nyid do // des na mi rtag pa la sogs pa dang /
T03D3799:200a-18: stong pa dag gcig pa ni phan tshun rang bzhin gcig pa nyid kyis shes pa dmigs pa'o //
T03D3799:200a-19: chos rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams
T03D3799:200a-20: kyis de kho na nyid rang rang bzhin gyis 'od
T03D3799:200a-21: gsal ba'o // gang zag rjes su mi 'dzin pa de ni rnam pa'o //
T03D3799:200a-22: da ni gzugs la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis 'od
T03D3799:200a-23: gsal ba rtse mor gyur pa chen po de'i dmigs
T03D3799:200a-24: pa dang rnam pa brjod pa bya ste /
T03D3799:200a-25: de la mtshan mar mi mthong phyir //
T03D3799:200a-27: thams cad dmigs su med par ni //
T03D3799:200a-28: shes rab kyis ni yongs brtag pa //
T03D3799:200a-30: de rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de nyid do //
T03D3799:200a-31: mtshan ma ni bde ba'i skabs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i
T03D3799:200a-32: sa yang dag par mthong ba ni sgro mi 'dogs
T03D3799:200a-34: thams cad ni brtags pa'i chos thams cad do //
T03D3799:200a-35: dmigs su med par ni gnyis su med par dmigs pa'i bdag nyid do //
T03D3799:200a-36: yongs su rtogs pa ni rang bzhin rjes su dpyod ces pa ste /
T03D3799:200a-37: rnam pa dgu ni dge ba'i rtsa ba g-yo ba'i
T03D3799:200a-38: rtse mor gyur pa nyid kyi rtse mor gyur pa
T03D3799:200a-40: bzod pa chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa brjod par bya ste /
T03D3799:200a-41: gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid med nyid //
T03D3799:200a-42: de med pa nyid ngo bo nyid //
T03D3799:200b-0: gzugs sogs @200b ngo bo nyid med ces pa ste dmigs pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-1: de rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa dngos po med pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-2: ngo bos stong pa ni brtags pas stong pa de'i rang bzhin te /
T03D3799:200b-3: gzugs la sogs pa stong pa ni ma yin zhes pa rnam pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-4: bzod pa 'bring gi dmigs pa dang rnam pa brjod par bya ste ;
T03D3799:200b-5: de dag skye med nges 'byung med //
T03D3799:200b-7: dag dang zhes pa ni rnam pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-8: 'dir yang gzugs sogs shes pa la snyeg pa ste
T03D3799:200b-9: skye med ces pa ni gzugs la sogs pa skye
T03D3799:200b-10: ba med pa'o // nges 'byung med ces pa ni gzugs la sogs pa rlag pa med pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-11: bdag dang zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa dag pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-12: bzod pa chen po'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa brjod par bya ste /
T03D3799:200b-13: de rnams mtshan ma med ces pa ni dmigs pa ste /
T03D3799:200b-14: de rnams zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-15: mtshan ma med pa nyid ni de rnams mtshan ma med pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-16: de yi mtshan mar mi brten pas //
T03D3799:200b-17: mos min 'du shes med pa yin //
T03D3799:200b-19: de'i ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams so //
T03D3799:200b-20: mtshan ma ni dbye ba'i tha snyad kyi rgyu'o //
T03D3799:200b-21: de la mi brten pa ni de rnams la mtshan ma med pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-22: gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid la mi brten pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-23: dngos po med pas na mos min ni khas mi len pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-24: 'du shes med ni mtshan ma yongs su 'dzin pa'i dngos po med pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-25: cho chen po la bzod pas na bzod pa ste rnam pa gsum mo //
T03D3799:200b-26: chos mchog chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa brjod par bya ste ;
T03D3799:200b-27: ting nge 'dzin zhes pa ni dmigs pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-28: de'i byed pa zhes pa ni rnam pa ste /
T03D3799:200b-29: mdo las ji ltar gsungs pa /
T03D3799:200b-33: seng ge rnam par rol pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-34: ting nge 'dzin de'i byed pa ni myur bar mngon
T03D3799:200b-35: par rdzogs par byang chub cing dka' ba med par
T03D3799:200b-36: 'gro ba'i byed pa zhes pa ni rna pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-37: cho mchog 'bring gi dmigs pa dang rnam pa brjod par bya ste /
T03D3799:200b-38: lung ston zhes pa ni dmigs pa'o //
T03D3799:200b-39: rlom pa zad ces pa ni rnam pa'o //
T03D3799:201a-0: de ltar sku gsum gyi bdag nyid @201a * //
T03D3799:201a-1: kyi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas nyid du thog mar lung ston pa ni dmigs pa'o //
T03D3799:201a-2: byang chub sems dpa' bdag ni rnam rtog thams cad
T03D3799:201a-3: las 'das pa zhes pa'i nga rgyal zad pa ni
T03D3799:201a-4: rnam pa'o // chos mchog chen po'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa brjod par bya ste /
T03D3799:201a-5: gsum po gcig gi ngo bor gcig / ces pa ni dmigs pa'o //
T03D3799:201a-6: ting nge 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pa zhes ba ni rnam pa'o //
T03D3799:201a-7: byang chub sems dpa' dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes
T03D3799:201a-8: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams phan tshun
T03D3799:201a-9: rang bzhin gcig pa zhes pa ni dmigs pa'o //
T03D3799:201a-10: byang chub sems dpa' de yang ting nge 'dzin la
T03D3799:201a-11: sogs pa de la rnam par rtog par mi byed
T03D3799:201a-13: 'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad las shin tu 'dus pa'i chos kyi mchog ste rnam pa gsum mo //
T03D3799:201a-14: de ltar nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa
T03D3799:201a-15: bzhi po rnams so sor chung ngu dang 'bring dang
T03D3799:201a-16: chen po'i dbye bas rnam pa bcu gnyis su shes
T03D3799:201a-17: par bya'o // 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mthong ba dang
T03D3799:201a-18: bsgom pa'i lam gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur
T03D3799:201a-19: ba nyid kyis spang bar bya ba'i rnam par rtog
T03D3799:201a-20: pa bzhi spong ba'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba brjod
T03D3799:201a-22: gzung bar rtog pa rnam pa gnyis //
T03D3799:201a-23: gzhi dang de yi gnyen po yis //
T03D3799:201a-24: rmongs dang phung sogs dbye ba yis //
T03D3799:201a-25: de ni so sor rnam pa dgu //
T03D3799:201a-27: gzung ba'i rnam rtog de ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3799:201a-28: kun nas nyon mongs pa la brten pa dang /
T03D3799:201a-29: gnyen po'i phyogs kyi dngos po la brten pa'o //
T03D3799:201a-30: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dngos po de yang rnam
T03D3799:201a-31: pa dgu yin pa nyid kyis de'i rnam par rtog
T03D3799:201a-33: gnyen po'i phyogs kyi dngos po yang rnam pa dgu
T03D3799:201a-34: yin pa nyid kyis de'i rnam rtog kyang rnam pa
T03D3799:201a-36: gzung ba'i rnam rtog ni so sor rnam pa dgu'o //
T03D3799:201a-37: de la mi rig pas yongs su bslang ba'i yul
T03D3799:201a-38: nyid kyis na ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o
T03D3799:201a-39: // phung po'i rnam par rtog pa dang ming dang
T03D3799:201a-40: gzugs la mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa
T03D3799:201a-41: dang mtha' gnyis la zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa
T03D3799:201a-42: // dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam
T03D3799:201b-0: par byang ba mi shes pa'i rnam @201b par rtog
T03D3799:201b-1: // dang / pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam la mi gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /

T03D3799:201b-3: bdag la sogs par rnam par rtog pa dang /

T03D3799:201b-13: bsgom pa'i lam la rnam par rtog pa dang /
T03D3799:201b-14: mi slob pa'i lam la rnam par rtog pa ste /

T03D3799:201b-17: de bzhin phung sogs rten sgo nas //

T03D3799:201b-22: rdzas kyi bdag nyid du gnas pa dang /
T03D3799:201b-23: btags pa'i bdag nyid du gnas pa'o //
T03D3799:201b-24: rdzas kyi bdag nyid kyang 'chad par 'gyur ba rang
T03D3799:201b-25: dbang la sogs pa'i dbye ba rnam pa dgu nyid
T03D3799:201b-26: kyis de'i yul can gyi rnam par rtog pa yang
T03D3799:201b-28: btags pa'i bdag nyid du grub pa yang phung po
T03D3799:201b-29: la sogs pa la brten pa'i sgo nas rnam pa
T03D3799:201b-30: dgu nyid kyi de'i yul can nyid kyis rnam par
T03D3799:201b-31: rtog pa yong rnam pa dgu'o //
T03D3799:201b-34: ji ltar gzung ba'i rnam rtog so sor rnam pa
T03D3799:201b-35: dgu yin pa de ltar 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog kyang
T03D3799:201b-37: de bdag rang dbang can du rnam par rtog pa dang /
T03D3799:201b-38: gcig pur rnam par rtog pa dang /
T03D3799:201b-39: rgyur rnam bar rtog pa dang /
T03D3799:201b-40: lta ba po la sogs pa'i bdag tu rnam par rtog pa dang /

T03D3799:201b-43: bdag mthong ba'i lam gyi gzhir rnam pa rtog pa dang /
T03D3799:201b-44: bsgom pa'i lam gyi gzhir rnam par rtog pa dang /
T03D3799:202a-1: byas pa'i gzhir rnam par rtog pa ste /

T03D3799:202a-10: khyad par gyi lam du btags pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /

T03D3799:202a-12: btags pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa du'o //
T03D3799:202a-13: sngon du mdor bstan pa'i yongs su 'dzin pa de
T03D3799:202a-14: rgyas par bstan pa'i dus la babs pas gsungs pa
T03D3799:202a-15: / sems mi 'gong ba nyid sogs kyis //

T03D3799:202a-18: rnam pa kun du yongs 'dzin yin //
T03D3799:202a-20: sems zhes pa ni slob ma'i sems so //
T03D3799:202a-21: mi 'gong ba ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bskyed pa la ma zhum pa'o //
T03D3799:202a-22: sogs pa'i sgras ji ltar dman par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3799:202a-23: de bzhin tu yang dag pa thabs la mkhas pas
T03D3799:202a-24: rang bzhin med pa la mkhas pas rang bzhin med
T03D3799:202a-25: pa la sos pa ston pa'o //
T03D3799:202a-26: rang bzhin med pa ni btags pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pas stong pa yin gyi /
T03D3799:202a-27: thams cad du chad pa nyid ni ma yin no //
T03D3799:202a-28: sogs pa'i sgras ni bsod nams kyi stong nge gnyis ka yang ston pa'o //
T03D3799:202a-29: de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
T03D3799:202a-31: de yi mi mthun phyogs por ba //
T03D3799:202a-33: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi de dag gi gang
T03D3799:202a-34: zhig mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni ser sna la sogs
T03D3799:202a-35: pa dang / ma rig pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3799:202a-36: de dag bor ba ni gang zhig de'i mi mthun
T03D3799:202a-37: pa'i phyogs de dag bor nas bsod nams dang ye
T03D3799:202a-38: shes kyi tshogs de dag ston pa'o //
T03D3799:202a-39: de dag nye bar bskyed pa po ser sna la
T03D3799:202a-40: sogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral ba'i skyes bu'i khyad
T03D3799:202b-0: par yang dag par yongs su 'dzin pa pa'i @202b
T03D3799:202b-1: bshes gnyen zhes pa'i don to //

T03D3799:202b-3: sgrub pa ni rten byang chub kyi spyod pa'o //
T03D3799:202b-6: rtogs pa yi ni chos drug dang //
T03D3799:202b-7: gnyen po dang ni spong ba dan /

T03D3799:202b-16: kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgrub pa'i rten ni rigs te

T03D3799:202b-19: chos kyi dbyings por ma grub ba nyid dngos su rigs ma yin te /
T03D3799:202b-20: 'on kyang dmigs pa yin pa nyid kyis rigs zhes brjod do //
T03D3799:202b-21: rgyu'i don gyis rigs kyi don te /

T03D3799:202b-30: gnyen po dang ni spong ba dang /

T03D3799:202b-40: gzhan gyi don gyi go rims dang //

T03D3799:202b-43: ye shes rtsol ba mi mnga' bar //
T03D3799:202b-44: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dka' ba med pas chos bcu gsum rtogs pa'o //
T03D3799:202b-45: gang zhig rigs pa ni 'dir skabs kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
T03D3799:202b-46: sgrub pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i rten gyi gnas shes pa'i don to //

T03D3799:203a-1: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid de /

T03D3799:203a-8: chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir //
T03D3799:203a-9: rigs ni tha dad rung ma yin //

T03D3799:207a-3: do // 'di rnams yongs su shes pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs so //

T03D3799:207a-27: yongs su sbyong ba shes par bya //

T03D3799:207a-31: sems can rnams la sems mnyam nyid //
T03D3799:207a-33: sems can thams cad la phan par sems pa'o //
T03D3799:207a-34: gtong dang zhes pa ni thams cad gtong ba'o //
T03D3799:207a-35: bshes gnyen bsten pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o //
T03D3799:207a-36: dam chos dmigs pa tshol ba dang //

T03D3799:207a-41: sangs rgyas skur 'dod dga' ba dang //
T03D3799:207a-42: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas ni bcom ldan 'das te /

T03D3799:207a-48: bden pa'i tshig ni bden pa'i tshig rnams te /

T03D3799:207b-2: yongs su sbyong bar shes par bya //
T03D3799:207b-4: 'di dag ni bsam pa la sogs pa'o //

T03D3799:207b-10: yongs su sbyong ba bcu po rnams stong pa nyid du bsgoms pas /
T03D3799:207b-11: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur ro //

T03D3799:207b-13: rab tu dga' dang snying brtse che //

T03D3799:207b-18: byas pa gzo zhes pa ni gzhan gyi phan pa byas pa dran pa'o //
T03D3799:207b-19: bzod ces pa ni bzod pa rnam pa gsum rdzogs pa'o //
T03D3799:207b-20: rab tu dga' dang zhes pa ni dam pa'i las la rab tu dga' ba'o //

T03D3799:207b-31: rlom med bdag nyid de rnams lnga //

T03D3799:207b-35: zang zing med par chos sbyin dang //

T03D3799:208a-2: rang dang gzhan gyi dbang du byas te mi dge
T03D3799:208a-3: ba'i chos rnams las ldog pa ste /
T03D3799:208a-5: rlom med bdag nyid ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i las te /
T03D3799:208a-6: des ni sa gsum pa 'od byed pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T03D3799:208a-7: nags gnas 'dod chung chog shes dang //
T03D3799:208a-8: sbyangs ba yang dag sdom sems dang //

T03D3799:208a-16: chog shes zhes pa ni rnyed pa thob pas chog shes shing lhag pa mi 'dod pa'o //
T03D3799:208a-17: sbyangs ba yang dag sdom bsten dang //

T03D3799:208a-19: bslab pa yongs su mi gong dang //

T03D3799:208a-21: 'dod pa rnams la smod pa dang //
T03D3799:208a-22: zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la smod pa'o //
T03D3799:208a-23: mya ngan 'da' zhes pa ni 'khor ba las zlog pa'o //
T03D3799:208a-24: bdog kun gtong zhes pa ni kun brtags par yod pa thams cad gtong pa'o //

T03D3799:208b-0: bdag @208b bstod gzhan la brnyas pa dang //

T03D3799:209b-0: chags pa'i @209b sa min gar 'dod par //

T03D3799:216b-2: byang chub tu bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba'i mtshan
T03D3799:216b-3: nyid de / bya ba'i khyad par gyis khyad par du yongs su bsngo ba'o //

T03D3799:216b-5: zhes pa ni bsod nams gang zhig yongs su bsngo ba dang /

T03D3799:216b-34: sangs rgyas rjes su yi rang dang //

T03D3799:216b-36: khams gsum gtogs pa ma yin dang //
T03D3799:216b-38: srid pa'i dngos po la ma chags pas yongs su
T03D3799:216b-39: bsngo ba ni khams gsum gtogs pa ma yin pas
T03D3799:216b-41: bsngo ba gzhan ni rnam gsum mo //
T03D3799:216b-42: zhes pa la sogs pa ni gzhan yongs su bsngo ba'o //
T03D3799:216b-43: bsod nams che 'byung bdag nyid do //

T03D3799:216b-46: chen po'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum mo //
T03D3799:216b-47: mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis yongs su bsngo ba ni chung ngu'o //
T03D3799:217a-1: rnal 'byor gyis yongs su bsngo ba ni 'bring ngo //
T03D3799:217a-2: gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyis yongs su bsngo ba ni chen po ste /
T03D3799:217a-3: yongs su bsngo ba'i dbye ba rnam pa bcu gnyis su bshad do //
T03D3799:217a-4: rjes su yi rang ba yid la byed pa gsungs pa /

T03D3799:217a-7: rjes su yi rang nyid byed pa //
T03D3799:217a-8: bsgom pa yin par 'dir brjod do //
T03D3799:217a-10: thabs kyis kun rdzob tu bsod nams kyi tshogs la

T03D3799:217a-12: 'dzin pa dag mi dmigs par rnam par dag par
T03D3799:217a-13: byas te / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
T03D3799:217a-14: sogs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la rjes su yi
T03D3799:217a-15: rang ba ni rjes su yi rang ba yid la
T03D3799:217a-16: byas te / byed pa'o // mos pa yid la byed pa dang /
T03D3799:217a-17: yongs su bsngo ba yid la byed pa dang /
T03D3799:217a-18: rjes su yi rang ba yid la byed pa'i bdag
T03D3799:217a-19: nyid rnam pa gsum ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i
T03D3799:217a-21: da ni zag pa med pa'i bsgom pa'i lam brjod par bya ste /
T03D3799:217a-22: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3799:217a-25: de la mngon du gyur pa gsungs pa /
T03D3799:217a-26: de yi ngo bo nyid mchog nyid //
T03D3799:217a-27: kun la mngon du mi byed dang //
T03D3799:217a-28: chos rnams dmigs pa mid par ni //
T03D3799:217a-29: gtod par byed pa don chen nyid //
T03D3799:217a-31: ngo bo zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i chos
T03D3799:217a-32: rnams phyin ci ma log pa'i de kho na nyid
T03D3799:217a-33: du ston pa ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin
T03D3799:217a-34: no // mchog ces pa ni bsgom pa'i lam ma
T03D3799:217a-35: gtogs par sangs rgyas thob par mi 'gyur zhes pa
T03D3799:217a-37: kun la mngon du mi byed ces pa ni bsgom
T03D3799:217a-38: pa'i lam gyi bye brag rtogs pas rab tu sbyong
T03D3799:217a-39: ba yang de kho na nyid la ste /
T03D3799:217a-40: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa'i chos thams cad ma skyes pas so //
T03D3799:217a-41: chos rnams dmigs pa med pa ni //
T03D3799:217a-42: zhes pa la mi dmigs par rnam par dag par byas te /
T03D3799:217a-43: kun rdzob tu rnal 'byor pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rnams bskyed par bya'o //
T03D3799:217a-44: don chen zhes pa la chen po ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi don te /
T03D3799:217a-45: 'dis na don chen ni bsgom pa'i lam ste /
T03D3799:217a-46: de'i sgom pa ni mngon du gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bsgom pa'i lam mo //
T03D3799:217b-0: bsgom @217b pa'i lam la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3799:217b-1: chos mtha' dag khas len pa'i rtsa ba ni mos
T03D3799:217b-2: pa'o // mos pa de nyid gang gi rgyu mtshan nyid kyis zhes pa la gsungs pa //
T03D3799:217b-3: sangs rgyas bsten dang sbyin sogs dang //
T03D3799:217b-4: thabs la mkhas pa gang yin pa //
T03D3799:217b-5: 'di la mos pa'i rgyu dag yin //
T03D3799:217b-6: chos kyis phongs pa'i rgyu dag ni //
T03D3799:217b-7: bdud kyi thibs kyis non pa dang //
T03D3799:217b-8: zab mo'i chos la ma mos dang //
T03D3799:217b-9: phung po la sogs mngon zhen dang //
T03D3799:217b-10: sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa'o //
T03D3799:217b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsten cing bkur ba dang /

T03D3799:217b-14: thabs ni sangs rgyas nyid 'grub pa'i rgyu rkyen te /
T03D3799:217b-15: de la mkhas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i rgyu dag yin no //
T03D3799:217b-16: bdud kyi thibs kyis non cing 'tshe ba dang /
T03D3799:217b-17: zab mo'i chos la mi mos pa dang /
T03D3799:217b-18: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03D3799:217b-19: sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa zhes pa ni chos kyi phongs pa'i rgyu yin no //
T03D3799:217b-20: rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bsgom pa'i lam gsungs pa /
T03D3799:217b-21: 'bras bu dag pa gzugs la sogs //
T03D3799:217b-22: dag pa nyid de gang gi phyir //
T03D3799:217b-23: de gnyis tha dad ma yin zhing //
T03D3799:217b-24: bcad du med pas dag par brjod //
T03D3799:217b-27: zag pa med pa rnam par dag pa gang zhig
T03D3799:217b-28: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la nges par grol ba de
T03D3799:217b-30: 'on kyang gzugs la sogs pa dag pa nyid do //
T03D3799:217b-31: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po zag pa dang bcas
T03D3799:217b-32: pa gang zhig dag pa ni de nyid de'i phyir
T03D3799:217b-33: 'bras bu dag pa dang gzugs dag pa la sogs
T03D3799:217b-34: pa dag pa de gnyis dbyer med gcad du med

T03D3799:217b-36: bu dang / gzugs la sogs pa gnyis ka rnam
T03D3799:217b-37: par dag pas na tha dad du ma grub pa'o
T03D3799:217b-38: bu dang / // gcad du med ces pa ni 'bras bu dag pa dang /
T03D3799:217b-39: gzugs la sogs pa dag pa gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin ba'i don to //

T03D3799:217b-41: nyon mongs shes bya lam gsum gyi //
T03D3799:217b-42: nyams phyir slob ma bse ru dang //
T03D3799:218a-0: rgyal sras rnams kyi dag pa @218a * //
T03D3799:218a-2: / sangs rgyas rnam kun shin tu ba //

T03D3799:218a-6: rtog pa spangs pa las rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam

T03D3799:218a-12: bcas pa spangs pa las shin tu ste sangs rgyas

T03D3799:218a-16: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad de /
T03D3799:218a-17: de rnams rnam par dag pa ni bsgrub par bya'o //
T03D3799:218a-18: de bas na sa dgu la bsgom pa'i lam rnam pa dgur bstan par bya ste /

T03D3799:218a-22: chung ngu la sogs lam yin no //

T03D3799:218a-24: chen po'i chen po la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i

T03D3799:218a-26: ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa'i lam gyi rim pa
T03D3799:218a-27: ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa dgu'o //
T03D3799:218a-28: sangs rgyas kyi dag pa ste ji ltar shin tu ba zhes pa la gsungs pa /

T03D3799:218a-31: gnyen po nyid du 'dod pa yin //
T03D3799:218a-33: 'jal byed dang gzhal bya mnyam pa nyid ces pa la 'jal byed ni 'dzin pa'o //
T03D3799:218a-34: gzhal bya ni gzung ba ste /
T03D3799:218a-35: de dag gi mnyam pa nyid ni gcig tu yang

T03D3799:218a-43: po'i phyogs kyi chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa'i
T03D3799:218a-44: mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la'o zhes pa ni mi

T03D3799:218b-17: de dag bar na mi gnas pa //
T03D3799:218b-18: dus rnams mnyam pa nyid shes phyir //
T03D3799:218b-19: shes rab pha rol phyin par 'dod //

T03D3799:218b-24: mya ngan las 'das pa dang dbus su yang khas
T03D3799:218b-25: mi len te / byang chub sems dpas 'di lta
T03D3799:218b-26: bur khas blang bar mi bya zhes rtogs par bya
T03D3799:218b-27: mi len te / ste / de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3799:218b-28: tshu rol min zhes pa ni 'khor ba la'o //
T03D3799:218b-29: pha rol min zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T03D3799:218b-30: de dag bar na mi gnas zhes pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T03D3799:218b-31: 'dod pa ni yang dag par 'dod pa'o //
T03D3799:218b-32: gang zhes pa la gsungs pa /
T03D3799:218b-33: dus rnams mnyam pa nyid shes phyir //
T03D3799:218b-35: dus gsum po rnams kyi dngos po kun rang gsal
T03D3799:218b-36: ba'i bdag nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pas stong pa
T03D3799:218b-37: de nyid mnyam pa nyid de dag dngos su mngon
T03D3799:218b-38: du byas pas 'khor ba la rab tu mi gnas
T03D3799:218b-39: pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu
T03D3799:218b-41: 'o na stong pa nyid ni thams cad du yod
T03D3799:218b-42: pa nyid de rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3799:218b-43: tu phyin pa yang thams cad du yod pa yin

T03D3799:219a-9: gzung ba dang 'dzin par dmigs pas thabs ma yin no //

T03D3799:219a-11: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring ba ste

T03D3799:219a-13: sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams ni thabs la mkhas pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa bkag pa'o //
T03D3799:219a-14: mtshan nyid kyi stong pa nyid mngon sum du byed
T03D3799:219a-15: pa'i bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu

T03D3799:219a-18: nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyis gzung ba dang

T03D3799:219a-20: gis byin gyis brlabs par shes pa ni mi mthun

T03D3799:219a-22: dus gsum gyi rang bzhin gcig tu shes pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs so //
T03D3799:219a-25: 'di ni da ltar ro zhes dbye ba nges par shes pa ni gnyen po'i phyogs so //
T03D3799:219a-26: ser sna la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs so //
T03D3799:219a-27: sbyin pa la sogs pa la chags pa dang /
T03D3799:219a-28: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams la chags pa ni gnyen po'i phyogs so //

T03D3799:219a-30: gzugs sogs phung po stong nyid dang //
T03D3799:219a-31: dus gsum rtogs pa'i chos rnams dang //
T03D3799:219a-32: sbyin sogs byang chub phyogs rnams la //
T03D3799:219a-33: spyod pa'i 'du shes mi mthun phyogs //
T03D3799:219a-35: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi gnyen po'i phyogs gang yin zhes sems pa gsungs pa /
T03D3799:219a-36: sbyin la sogs la ngar 'dzin med //
T03D3799:219a-37: gzhan dag de la sbyor byed pa //
T03D3799:219a-38: de ni chags pa'i mtha' 'gog pas //
T03D3799:219a-39: rgyal la sogs la chags pa phra //
T03D3799:219a-41: sbyin pa la sogs pa la rang nyid kyang kun du spyod pa dang /
T03D3799:219a-42: gzhan dag kyang de la 'god par byed pa dang /
T03D3799:219b-0: @219b bdag dang bdag gi med par rtogs pas ngar
T03D3799:219b-1: 'dzin med pa ni chags pa med pa la rab
T03D3799:219b-2: tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnyen po'i phyogs
T03D3799:219b-4: 'di nyid ces pa'i chags pa med pa la zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid ni nga rgyal med pa'o //
T03D3799:219b-5: chags pa'i mtha' 'gog pa ni chags pa'i tshogs rnams
T03D3799:219b-6: zad par byed cing 'gog par byed pas na 'gog
T03D3799:219b-7: pa'o // gal te byang chub sems dpas chags pa
T03D3799:219b-8: med pa kho na la 'jug par byed na de
T03D3799:219b-9: lta na ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa
T03D3799:219b-10: rnams la mchod pa bya ba dang /
T03D3799:219b-13: sbyin pa la sogs pa yang mngon par chags pa
T03D3799:219b-14: yin pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs su thal bar 'gyur
T03D3799:219b-15: ro zhes sems na bden te /
T03D3799:219b-16: bla na med pa'i tshogs kyi rgyur chags pa phra
T03D3799:219b-17: mo 'di yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid do zhes
T03D3799:219b-18: pa 'di la skrag par mi bya'o //
T03D3799:219b-19: chags pa phra mo 'di mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid
T03D3799:219b-20: yin pa de ji ltar zhes pa la gsung pa
T03D3799:219b-21: / chos kyi lam ni rang bzhin gyis //
T03D3799:219b-22: dben pa'i phyir na de zab nyid //

T03D3799:219b-26: chos kyi lam ni brtags pa'i tshogs te /

T03D3799:232a-20: kyi chos bstan pa na 'jig rten pa rnams ni
T03D3799:232a-21: mngon par brjod pa la 'jug ste de bas mngon
T03D3799:232a-22: pa brjod pa de med pa'i bdag nyid kyi shes

T03D3799:232a-24: pas 'jig rten pa thams cad las mi mthun par

T03D3799:232a-29: thogs pa med pa'i rang bzhin no //
T03D3799:232a-30: gzhi med 'gro med skye med dang //

T03D3799:232a-32: gnas med pa dang 'gro ba med pa dang skye

T03D3799:232a-35: 'dir 'gro med ces pa ni 'gro ba med pa'i rang bzhin no //
T03D3799:232a-36: skye med ces pas skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin no //

T03D3799:232b-5: // bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid de 'dir ji ltar mtshan nyid yin /

T03D3799:232b-30: 'dod do // dgongs so // gang zhig 'dir thar

T03D3799:232b-37: chos rnams rnam pa thams cad du //
T03D3799:232b-38: shes pa'i shes rab dang rnam lnga //
T03D3799:232b-39: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnon po yis //
T03D3799:232b-40: rtogs sla rtul pos rtogs dkar bzhed //
T03D3799:232b-42: sangs rgyas dmigs sogs dad pa dang //
T03D3799:232b-44: sbyin sogs spyod yul brtson 'grus dang //
T03D3799:232b-46: bsam pa phun tshogs dran pa ni sems can thams
T03D3799:232b-47: cad la yi rang bas dge bar 'dod pa ste

T03D3799:233a-3: cad du shes pa ni shes rab ste lnga pa'o
T03D3799:233a-4: // dge ba'i rnam pa lnga ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun par bzhed do //

T03D3799:233a-8: 'bring gis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo //

T03D3799:233a-10: da ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa gsungs pa /
T03D3799:233a-11: dro ba rnams kyi dmigs pa 'dir //

T03D3799:244a-5: zad pa dang ma skyes pa rnams mi skye ba'o

T03D3799:244b-13: sgrib pa nga'i nus mthus te /

T03D3799:245a-37: mnyam gzhag min pas mtshams gzungs te //

T03D3799:246a-6: lam gyi sbyor ba gang gi rnam pa'i khyad par
T03D3799:246a-7: yin pa de'i spyod yul ni gzhom bya nyid kyi
